_header: Myself walking all alone / full of thought of joy desperate
_description: A Complaint against Fortune — three stanzas rhyme royal

CULFf16.First Lines:
My self walkyng all alloneffull of thoght of Ioy desperatTo my
                    hert makyng my mooneHow I am the most Infortunat…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…Soo haue I lost my countenaunceMy hoole comfort & my
                        plesaunceOf all the woorld to my plesance
CULFf16.Facsimiles:

             The Findern Manuscript: Cambridge University Library MS. F.1.6.
         London: Scolar Press, 1977.
